perSceneAudio.header_text.message: To manage audio settings per scene, select and add scenes below. A highlighted scene below means it is the current scene on stage.

perSceneAudio.scene_crossfade_tooltip.message: Switching to another scene will make a smooth transition between the audio of the previous scene and current selected scene.

perSceneAudio.default_tooltip.message: Scenes that you don't assign specific audio levels to will use these values as default.
